name: Kiwimon
description: Kiwimon is derived from both the kiwi ( Apteryx australis ) and the kiwifruit . Like the bird, it is a wingless, flightless avian with a brown, furry body. It also has leaves around its neck, referencing the plant and fruit. It wears a large mask that covers its face, which is fitted with a long beak like that of the bird.
